mapper.select: select id as id2, talent_resource_id, level_major, initial_conversion, issue_cert_time, continuing_education_date, creator_id as creator_id2, gmt_create as gmt_create2, regenerator_id as regenerator_id2, gmt_modified as gmt_modified2 from construction_industry_api.t_talent_resource_certificate where talent_resource_id = #{id}

select t1.id , t1.is_shared , t1.full_name , t1.sex , t1.area , t1.social_security , t1.telephone_number , t1.qq_number , t1.education , t1.title , t1.class_three_personnel , t1.tender_exit , t1.certificate_status , t1.talent_type , t1.talent_price , t1.talent_price_number , t1.number_unit , t1.talent_requirement , t1.follow_up_situation , t1.remark , t1.creator_id , t1.gmt_create , t1.regenerator_id , t1.gmt_modified , t2.id as id2 , t2.talent_resource_id , t2.level_major , t2.initial_conversion , t2.issue_cert_time , t2.continuing_education_date , t2.creator_id as creator_id2 , t2.gmt_create as gmt_create2 , t2.regenerator_id as regenerator_id2 , t2.gmt_modified as gmt_modified2 from construction_industry_api.t_talent_resource as t1 left join construction_industry_api.t_talent_resource_certificate as t2 on t1.id = t2.talent_resource_id where t1.id = #{id} order by t1.id desc

select id , is_shared , full_name , sex , area , social_security , telephone_number , qq_number , education , title , class_three_personnel , tender_exit , certificate_status , talent_type , talent_price , talent_price_number , number_unit , talent_requirement , follow_up_situation , remark , creator_id , gmt_create , regenerator_id , gmt_modified from construction_industry_api.t_talent_resource where creator_id = #{userId} order by id desc

select id , is_shared , full_name , sex , area , social_security , telephone_number , qq_number , education , title , class_three_personnel , tender_exit , certificate_status , talent_type , talent_price , talent_price_number , number_unit , talent_requirement , follow_up_situation , remark , creator_id , gmt_create , regenerator_id , gmt_modified from construction_industry_api.t_talent_resource where is_shared = 1 order by id desc
